titles.title: Lord Thou Knowest All The Hunger (easy)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Seeking now - Seeking now Let Thy Spirit meet me now{/lang-eng}

verse.name: c2
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lord Thou knowest all the hunger Of The heart that seeks Thee now How my soul hath long been craving What Thou only canst bestow{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Failure in my walk and witness Failure in my work I see Fruitless toil un-Christlike living Calling forth no praise to Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Now to Thee my soul confesses All its failure - All its sin All the pride the self-contentment All the "secret faults" within{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Save me from myself my Father From each subtle form of pride Lead me now with Christ to Calvary Show me I with Him have died{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}No more let it be my working Nor my wisdom love or power But the life of Jesus only Passing through me hour by hour{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Let the fullness of Thy Spirit Resting on Him cover me That the witness borne to others May bring glory Lord to Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Father in Thy Son's Name pleading I believe my prayer is heard And I praise Thee for the answer Resting simply on Thy Word{/lang-eng}
